con:part.con:content: <!--Published by JAX-WS RI at http://jax-ws.dev.java.net. RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-hudson-28-.--> <wsdl:definitions name="ItemStorageService" targetNamespace="http://www.acme.com/service/ns/itemstorageservice/1.0/" xmlns:request="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/request/1.0/" xmlns:response="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/response/1.0/" xmlns:fault="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/fault/1.0/"> <!--Imports--> <wsdl:types> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/headers/authentication/1.0/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/orderplacement/ItemStorageService?xsd=1"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/request/1.0/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/orderplacement/ItemStorageService?xsd=4"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/response/1.0/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/orderplacement/ItemStorageService?xsd=5"/> </xsd:schema> <xsd:schema> <xsd:import namespace="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/fault/1.0/" schemaLocation="http://localhost:8080/orderplacement/ItemStorageService?xsd=2"/> </xsd:schema> </wsdl:types> <!--Messages--> <wsdl:message name="AuthenticationContextHeader"> <wsdl:part element="auth:AuthenticationContext" name="AuthenticationContextHeader"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RegisterItemRequest"> <wsdl:part element="request:RegisterItemRequest" name="RegisterItemRequest"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="RegisterItemResponse"> <wsdl:part element="response:RegisterItemResponse" name="RegisterItemResponse"/> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault"> <wsdl:part element="fault:ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault" name="fault"/> </wsdl:message> <!--Port Type--> <wsdl:portType name="ItemStorageServicePortType"> <wsdl:operation name="registerItem"> <wsdl:input name="RegisterItemRequest" message="tns:RegisterItemRequest"/> <wsdl:output name="RegisterItemResponse" message="tns:RegisterItemResponse"/> <wsdl:fault name="ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault" message="tns:ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault"/> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <!--Binding--> <wsdl:binding name="ItemStorageServiceSOAPBinding" type="tns:ItemStorageServicePortType"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="registerItem"> <soap:operation soapAction="http://www.acme.com/service/ns/itemstorageservice/1.0/registerItem"/> <wsdl:input name="RegisterItemRequest"> <soap:body use="literal"/> <soap:header use="literal" part="AuthenticationContextHeader" message="tns:AuthenticationContextHeader" wsdl:required="true"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="RegisterItemResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> <wsdl:fault name="ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault"> <soap:fault name="ItemAlreadyRegisteredFault" use="literal"/> </wsdl:fault> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="ItemStorageService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:ItemStorageServiceSOAPBinding" name="ItemStorageServicePort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8080/orderplacement/ItemStorageService"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>

RI's version is JAX-WS RI 2.2.1-hudson-28-.--> <schema targetNamespace="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/model/1.0/" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" version="1.0" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:tns="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/model/1.0/"> <!--Item specification--> <simpleType name="ItemSpecificationNumber"> <restriction base="string"> <length value="30"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="ItemSpecification"> <sequence> <element name="itemSpecificationNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="tns:ItemSpecificationNumber"/> <element name="name" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="string"/> </sequence> </complexType> <complexType name="ItemSpecifications"> <sequence> <element name="itemSpecification" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="unbounded" nillable="false" type="tns:ItemSpecification"/> </sequence> </complexType> <!--Item--> <simpleType name="ItemNumber"> <restriction base="string"> <length value="30"/> </restriction> </simpleType> <complexType name="Item"> <sequence> <element name="itemNumber" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="tns:ItemNumber"/> <element name="name" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="string"/> <element name="description" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="string"/> <element name="itemSpecifications" minOccurs="1" maxOccurs="1" nillable="false" type="tns:ItemSpecifications"/> </sequence> </complexType> </schema>

con:call.name: InvalidCredentials
con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/headers/authentication/1.0/" xmlns:ns1="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/request/1.0/" xmlns:ns2="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/model/1.0/"> <soapenv:Header> <ns:AuthenticationContext> <ns:username>blah</ns:username> <ns:password>blubb</ns:password> </ns:AuthenticationContext> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ns1:RegisterItemRequest> <ns1:itemToRegister> <ns2:itemNumber>ITM-003-000000032</ns2:itemNumber> <ns2:name>New Test Item 32</ns2:name> <ns2:description>Test item description</ns2:description> <ns2:itemSpecifications> <ns2:itemSpecification> <ns2:itemSpecificationNumber>ITMSPEC-003-000032</ns2:itemSpecificationNumber> <ns2:name>New Test Item Spec 32</ns2:name> </ns2:itemSpecification> </ns2:itemSpecifications> </ns1:itemToRegister> </ns1:RegisterItemRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>

con:call.con:request: <soapenv:Envelope xmlns:soapenv="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/envelope/" xmlns:ns="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/headers/authentication/1.0/" xmlns:ns1="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/request/1.0/" xmlns:ns2="http://www.acme.com/schema/ns/itemstorageservice/model/1.0/"> <soapenv:Header> <ns:AuthenticationContext> <ns:username>guest</ns:username> <ns:password>guest</ns:password> </ns:AuthenticationContext> </soapenv:Header> <soapenv:Body> <ns1:RegisterItemRequest> <ns1:itemToRegister> <ns2:itemNumber>ITM-003-000000035</ns2:itemNumber> <ns2:name>New Test Item 35</ns2:name> <ns2:description>Test item description</ns2:description> <ns2:itemSpecifications> <ns2:itemSpecification> <ns2:itemSpecificationNumber>ITMSPEC-003-000035</ns2:itemSpecificationNumber> <ns2:name>New Test Item Spec 35</ns2:name> </ns2:itemSpecification> </ns2:itemSpecifications> </ns1:itemToRegister> </ns1:RegisterItemRequest> </soapenv:Body> </soapenv:Envelope>
